member.name: INTERACTION_STATE
member.summary: Specifies the state of the Interaction Context object.

member.name: INTERACTION_STATE.INTERACTION_STATE_IDLE
member.summary: There are no ongoing interactions and all transitional states (inertia, double tap) are complete. It is safe to reuse the Interaction Context object.

member.name: INTERACTION_STATE.INTERACTION_STATE_IN_INTERACTION
member.summary: There is an ongoing interaction. One or more contacts are detected, or inertia is in progress.

member.name: INTERACTION_STATE.INTERACTION_STATE_POSSIBLE_DOUBLE_TAP
member.summary: All contacts are lifted, but the time threshold for double tap has not been crossed.
